# Draft:Kingsley Assefuah

| nationality        = Ghanaian
| education          = Huni Valley Senior High School
University of Cape Coast
| occupation         = Blogger
}}
Kingsley Assefuah, known professionally as Yhang Mhany, is a Ghanaian blogger. He is the founder of Earn More Cash Today, a website that expose online scams. He has been cited in GhanaWeb for his creativity with online safety advocacy.
